1623850.name: Naught Bots
1623850.description:
Developed by solo dev JT Mitchell.

Naught Bots is a single-player fps game that takes place inside the hive mind of the oppressively happy Naughty_Bot_Network. You play as a virus bot determined to wipe the smiles off of each and every last Naughty Bots face. Survive wave after wave of unrelenting Naughty Bots as the hive mind changes the level around you.

-Make cute things cry.
-Survive waves of oppressively happy Naughty Bots.
-Dynamic level changes around you.
-Upgrade your weapon.
-Use special abilities to unleash devastation.
-Jam out to Synth Rock music by Ghostfeeder.
-Support Solo Dev JT Mitchell (Shameless plug).
1623850.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
